thread.title: Catcher Matt Wieters, Nationals close to agreement
thread.title_full: Catcher Matt Wieters, Nationals close to agreement

title: Catcher Matt Wieters, Nationals close to agreement
text: A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Tampa: Yankees pitcher Jordan Montgomery runs "The Hill" in conditioning workouts. Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports West Palm Beach, Fla.: Vincenzo Fiorino, 9, of Annandale, Va., holds a baseball signed by various Nationals players at spring training. Michael Ares, AP Surprise, Ariz.: Rangers pitcher Jose Valdespina throws during a workout. Charlie Riedel, AP Port Charlotte, Fla.: Rays' Kevin Kiermaier works out at camp. David Goldman, AP Lakeland, Fla.: Members of the Tigers run a drill during a workout. Matt Rourke, AP Port St. Lucie, Fla.: For the Mets pitching staff, it's all about the hair -- Jacob deGrom. Jasen Vinlove, USA TODAY Sports Jupiter, Fla.: Time for sprints for the Cardinals. Steve Mitchell, USA TODAY Sports Dunedin, Fla.: Duck! Pitch from Blue Jays pitcher J.A. Happ coming right at you. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Tampa: All in the family. Yankees fans visit camp. Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports Dunedin, Fla.: Gut check. Blue Jays pitcher Chad Girodo fields a ball during his workout. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Glendale, Ariz.: A stroll in the park for Dodgers pitcher Rich Hill? Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Jupiter, Fla.: The number 16 patch to honor the late Jose Fernandez. Steve Mitchell, USA TODAY Sports Glendale, Ariz.: Is that Sergio Romo in a Dodgers uniform? Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Glendale, Ariz.: Time to mend the diamonds. Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Glendale, Ariz.: Clayton Kershaw and his teammates run drills. Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Tampa: Yankees' Gary Sanchez works on that power stroke. Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports Dunedin, Fla.: Blue Jays relief pitcher Roberto Osuna and teammates warm up at their first spring training at Cecil P. Englebert Recreation Complex. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Mesa, Ariz.: Cubs third baseman Kris Bryant gets some early hacks in the cage. Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Lake Buena Vista, Fla.: Braves starting pitcher Bartolo Colon stretches his arms during his workout. Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports Goodyear, Ariz.: Reds catchers participate in a bullpen session. Kareem Elgazzer, The Enquirer-USA TODAY Sports Goodyear, Ariz.: Reds pitchers perform condition drills during their first workout. . Kareem Elgazzar, USA TODAY Sports Fort Myers, Fla: The sun sets behind palm trees at JetBlue Park at Fenway South. David Goldman, AP Goodyear, Ariz.: With parked passenger airplanes looming in the background, Indians pitcher Corey Kluber warms up. Ross D. Franklin, AP Fort Myers, Fla.: Chris Sale now a Red Sox. David Goldman, AP Fort Myers: Red Sox's Andrew Benintendi, right, runs with teammates during a workout. David Goldman, AP Goodyear, Ariz.: Indians grounds crew prepares for spring training. Rick Scuteri, USA TODAY Sports Tampa: George M. Steinbrenner Field, home of the Yankees. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Tampa: CC Sabathia is all smiles during the first day of workout. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
